attributes.action: increase the minimum wage to £6.50 and for everyone over the age of 16
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone should get the same level of pay and this is the only way that wealth can be redistributed. £6.50 would be a start and therefore should be supported at the least. 16 year olds should not be penalised so much when they enter the work place as they end up on over £1 less per hour than 22 year olds and 21 year olds are on nearly £1 less than 22 year olds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
